replies.body:
[Check out this thread for details around limited time queues](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/wgM0WBsO-queue-schedule-updated-feb-8th)

ATM, it's:
Thursday: 5:00pm - 0:00am AEDT
Friday: 5:00pm - 0:00am AEDT
Is there a chance you can make it more frequent for the end of season, given some people want to grind the queues but are unavailable on those days and times?

[I'll link to this comment for a bit more context around why these queues are the way they are.](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/glATfXAE-queue-changes-draft-update-ranked-change?comment=00040000)

This is similar to the Normal Draft changes that we've made in the last week (in that thread). We're keeping an eye on how Ranked 3v3 Twisted Treeline goes during this week - as more players may be playing due to the Ranked Rewards announcement. 

I don't want to get too many hopes up however, as Twisted Treeline is significantly less popular than Normal Draft currently.
Not often enough to keep me interested unfortunately.
I think I am gonna smash it out for end of season, but yeah, sad times.
